titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to J. E. Barr
CWG13982

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
488
March 16th 5
J. E. Barr
Franklin Ky
Sir;
Yours of Feb 1st to Gov Bramlette has been referred to this Office for answer.
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State troops already in the field. If in the future, it is determined to raise more your application will recieve due attention,

Very Respectfully
D W. Lindsey
Adjutant Gen Ky
